q: SELECT x/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value as diagnosis, x/data[at0001]/items[at0077]/value/value as time FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS EVALUATION x[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1] where e/ehr_id/value = $ehr_id order by x/data[at0001]/items[at0077]/value/value desc
